channel.title: NPC Help
channel.description: How would I make it so a npc can hit me from a distance without having to move right next to me. This is for delta base. I already have the npc attacks set up and prayers etc.. Just need to make it so that the npc will hit more then 1 person, and won't have to be next to the person.

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“sheeba, post:3, topic:300599”]Yea kind of like the ape atoll monkeys.

I am making my own boss/minigame and the boss uses mage/range but I want to make him hit everyone that is around him and I don’t want the npc to move but still attack.[/quote]
Not a clue on how to make npcs range… But I’ve seen it done :s

Read full topic

How would I make it so a npc can hit me from a distance without having to move right next to me. This is for delta base. I already have the npc attacks set up and prayers etc… Just need to make it so that the npc will hit more then 1 person, and won’t have to be next to the person.

You mean like ape atoll monkeys, or gwd boss magic hitting everyone?
